name: I Heart Stan
description:
Dustin is on a quest to summon Satan at any cost. Inspired by evil babies, his plan is to create so much noise that Satan has to step into the mortal world and pay attention to him.

Create noise by MASHING BUTTONS on your keyboard and activating car alarms throughout the town using SPACE to interact with them.

Beware of the angry neighbours! Use the arrow keys to evade their angry pokes and run.
